Description.Text: Nestled between historic Durham and the dramatic North York Moors, The Eden Arms Hotel provides a central base for exploring the beautiful Durham countryside and nearby cities of Newcastle and Sunderland. The Eden Arms Hotel retains a charming atmosphere and history that dates back to the 17th Century. Once a traditional coaching inn, the hotel offers high standards of comfort and facilities to accommodate your stay. There are plenty of leisure facilities to take advantage of in the hotel's leisure club including an indoor heated swimming pool, spa, sauna, steam room and fitness room. Light snacks and drinks are available in the Brancepeth Lounge and for dinner, the popular Lord Eldon Restaurant which boasts an RAC Dining Award. This restaurant offers a variety of mouth-watering dishes to suit every taste. The hotel is a popular choice for ramblers who enjoy scenic walks in the Durham countryside. Organised walks can be arranged through the hotel.
